languages.text: Грузовая магистраль стала рассадником хворей, что привлекло внимание разлагающих сил. Они берегут от огня и варпа корабль, дабы в недрах его зараженные продолжали делиться гнилостными дарами.

traits.locale_text: Грузовая магистраль стала рассадником хворей, что привлекло внимание разлагающих сил. Они берегут от огня и варпа корабль, дабы в недрах его зараженные продолжали делиться гнилостными дарами.

languages.text: The freight line has become a cesspool of disease, which has drawn the attention of the forces of rot and decay. They protect the ship from fire and warp energies so that the infected may continue exchanging putrid gifts in the bowels of the vessel.
languages.original_text: Грузовая магистраль стала рассадником хворей, что привлекло внимание разлагающих сил. Они берегут от огня и варпа корабль, дабы в недрах его зараженные продолжали делиться гнилостными дарами.

traits.locale_text: The freight line has become a cesspool of disease, which has drawn the attention of the forces of rot and decay. They protect the ship from fire and warp energies so that the infected may continue exchanging putrid gifts in the guts of the vessel.

The freight line has become a cesspool of disease, which has drawn the attention of the forces of rot and decay. They protect the ship from fire and warp energies so that the infected may continue exchanging putrid gifts in the bowels of the vessel.

languages.text: La línea de carga se ha convertido en un foco de infecciones que ha despertado el interés de las fuerzas de la podredumbre y la descomposición. Protegen la nave de las llamas y energías de la disformidad para que los infectados puedan seguir propagando sus pútridos dones en las entrañas del navío.
languages.original_text: The freight line has become a cesspool of disease, which has drawn the attention of the forces of rot and decay. They protect the ship from fire and warp energies so that the infected may continue exchanging putrid gifts in the bowels of the vessel.

traits.locale_text: La línea de carga se ha convertido en un foco de infecciones que ha despertado el interés de las fuerzas de la podredumbre y la descomposición. Protegen la nave de las llamas y energías de la disformidad para que los infectados puedan seguir propagando sus pútridos dones en las entrañas del navío.

languages.text: 貨物船は病の巣窟となり、腐敗やその勢力をよせ集めている。これらは炎や〈歪み〉のエネルギーから船を守り、感染者たちが船底で腐敗の贈り物を交換し続けることができるようにしている。
languages.original_text: The freight line has become a cesspool of disease, which has drawn the attention of the forces of rot and decay. They protect the ship from fire and warp energies so that the infected may continue exchanging putrid gifts in the bowels of the vessel.

traits.locale_text: 貨物船は病の巣窟となり、腐敗やその勢力をよせ集めている。これらは炎や〈歪み〉のエネルギーから船を守り、感染者たちが船底で腐敗の贈り物を交換し続けることができるようにしている。

languages.text: 货运区域已经变成了疫病的藏污纳垢之地，掌管凋零与腐朽的亚空间实体也注意到了这片区域。它们保护飞船免受火焰与亚空间能量的威胁，允许感染者在舰船深处继续交换朽烂的赐福。
languages.original_text: The freight line has become a cesspool of disease, which has drawn the attention of the forces of rot and decay. They protect the ship from fire and warp energies so that the infected may continue exchanging putrid gifts in the bowels of the vessel.

traits.locale_text: 货运区域已经变成了疫病的藏污纳垢之地，掌管凋零与腐朽的亚空间实体也注意到了这片区域。它们保护飞船免受火焰与亚空间能量的威胁，允许感染者在舰船深处继续交换朽烂的赐福。

languages.text: Die Frachtroute ist zu einer Kloake der Krankheit verkommen, die die Aufmerksamkeit der Mächte des Verfalls erregt hat. Sie schützen das Schiff vor Feuer und Warpenergien, damit die Infizierten in den Eingeweiden des Schiffs ihre abscheulichen Gaben weitergeben können.
languages.original_text: The freight line has become a cesspool of disease, which has drawn the attention of the forces of rot and decay. They protect the ship from fire and warp energies so that the infected may continue exchanging putrid gifts in the bowels of the vessel.

traits.locale_text: Die Frachtroute ist zu einer Kloake der Krankheit verkommen, die die Aufmerksamkeit der Mächte des Verfalls erregt hat. Sie schützen das Schiff vor Feuer und Warpenergien, damit die Infizierten in den Eingeweiden des Schiffs ihre abscheulichen Gaben weitergeben können.

languages.text: La ligne de fret est devenue un véritable foyer d'infection, ce qui a attiré l'attention des forces de la pourriture et de la décomposition. Elles protègent le vaisseau contre les incendies et les énergies du Warp de manière à ce que les infectés puissent continuer à propager leurs miasmes dans les entrailles du vaisseau.
languages.original_text: The freight line has become a cesspool of disease, which has drawn the attention of the forces of rot and decay. They protect the ship from fire and warp energies so that the infected may continue exchanging putrid gifts in the bowels of the vessel.

traits.locale_text: La ligne de fret est devenue un véritable foyer d'infection, ce qui a attiré l'attention des forces de la pourriture et de la décomposition. Elles protègent le vaisseau contre les incendies et les énergies du Warp de manière à ce que les infectés puissent continuer à propager leurs miasmes dans les entrailles du vaisseau.

languages.text: Yük hattı, çürüme ve bozulma güçlerinin dikkatini cezbeden bir hastalık çukura dönüştü. Gemiyi yangından ve öteboyut enerjilerinden koruyorlar ki hastalıklılar, geminin derinliklerinde kokuşmuş hediyelerini değiş tokuş etmeye devam edebilsinler.
languages.original_text: The freight line has become a cesspool of disease, which has drawn the attention of the forces of rot and decay. They protect the ship from fire and warp energies so that the infected may continue exchanging putrid gifts in the bowels of the vessel.
